column2: Jeff Bezos' rocket company to begin suborbital test flights this year CAPE CANAVERAL
column4: April 7 A space company owned by Amazon.com founder Jeff Bezos has finished work on a rocket engine for a suborbital spaceship and expects to begin flight tests this year
column5: Blue Origin officials said on Tuesday.

column2: MOVES-BofA Merrill Lynch hires Michael Casey from Morgan Stanley April 7 Bank of America Merrill Lynch hired Michael Casey from Morgan Stanley as director of its Nevada Boise complex.
UPDATE 2-Boeing beats Airbus in Q1 net orders
column4: April 7 U.S. planemaker Boeing  beat European rival Airbus in net new orders and deliveries in the first quarter
column5: according to figures released on Tuesday.

column2: Dollar Tree says FTC wants 340 stores sold ahead of Family Dollar dealUPDATE 1-Dollar Tree says FTC wants 340 stores sold ahead of Family Dollar deal April 7 Dollar Tree Inc said the U.S. Federal Trade Commission has identified about 340 stores to be divested for the $8.5 billion takeover of Family Dollar Stores Inc to go through.  UPDATE 1-Dollar Tree says FTC wants 340 stores sold ahead of Family Dollar deal April 7 Dollar Tree Inc said the U.S. Federal Trade Commission has identified about 340 stores to be divested for the $8.5 billion takeover of Family Dollar Stores Inc to go through. UPDATE 3-Shell seeking to buy BG in first oil super-merger in over a decade April 7 Royal Dutch Shell is in advanced talks to buy BG Group in the first oil super-merger since early 2000s to extend its global lead in gas production and close the gap with the world's biggest oil major U.S. ExxonMobil.
